querySet.name: OrfAttributes
querySet.testRowCountSql: select count(na_feature_id) from dots.miscellaneous f, sres.SequenceOntology so where so.sequence_ontology_id = f.sequence_ontology_id and so.term_name = 'ORF'

sqlQuery.name: Bfmv
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT bfmv.source_id, bfmv.project_id, bfmv.nas_id, bfmv.length, bfmv.organism, bfmv.ncbi_tax_id, '' || SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, 1, 1) || '.' || REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(bfmv.organism, INSTR(bfmv.organism, ' ')), '[[:space:]]+', chr(38) || 'nbsp;') || '' AS formatted_organism, bfmv.start_min as orf_start,bfmv.end_max as orf_end, trim(to_char(bfmv.end_max,'999,999,999')) as orf_end_text, trim(to_char(bfmv.start_min,'999,999,999')) as orf_start_text, decode(bfmv.is_reversed,0,'+',1,'-',null) as orf_strand FROM apidb.OrfAttributes bfmv

sqlQuery.name: Sequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT nf.source_id,ts.sequence, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM dots.TranslatedAaSequence ts, dots.TranslatedAaFeature tf, dots.NaFeature nf, sres.SequenceOntology so WHERE nf.na_feature_id = tf.na_feature_id AND ts.aa_sequence_id = tf.aa_sequence_id AND so.term_name = 'ORF' AND nf.sequence_ontology_id = so.sequence_ontology_id

SELECT taas.source_id as source_id, ext.name as project_id, taas.sequence from dots.TranslatedAASequence taas, sres.SequenceOntology s, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease extr, sres.ExternalDatabase ext WHERE taas.sequence_ontology_id = s.sequence_ontology_id AND s.term_name = 'ORF' AND taas.external_database_release_id=extr.external_database_release_id AND extr.external_database_id=ext.external_database_id
